items.text_for_match: Ten-man Everton stun Man Utd after Gueye sees red after Idrissa Gueye is sent off for striking a team-mate, 10-man Everton beat Manchester United to earn David Moyes his first Premier League win as a visiting manager to Old Trafford. after Idrissa Gueye is sent off for striking a team-mate, 10-man Everton beat Manchester United to earn David Moyes his first Premier League win as a visiting manager to Old Trafford.

items.ja: Why are there 12pm and 2:05pm kick-offs in Premier League on Sunday?
items.en: Why are there 12pm and 2:05pm kick-offs in Premier League on Sunday?
items.text_for_match: Why are there 12pm and 2:05pm kick-offs in Premier League on Sunday? BBC Sport's Ask Me Anything team explains why four kick-offs on Sunday have unusual start times BBC Sport's Ask Me Anything team explains why four kick-offs on Sunday have unusual start times

items.ja: Real Madrid sorry for Jota and Andre Silva tribute error
items.en: Real Madrid sorry for Jota and Andre Silva tribute error
items.text_for_match: Real Madrid sorry for Jota and Andre Silva tribute error Real Madrid apologise for a mistake in a video paying tribute to Diogo Jota and his brother Andre Silva. Real Madrid apologise for a mistake in a video paying tribute to Diogo Jota and his brother Andre Silva.
